biotools.summary: Bayesian network model that integrates genomic, transcriptomic and proteomic data to predict protein abundance. Specifically, by using expression, sequence and interaction data, we effectively link transcriptional information with post-transcriptional and protein translational data.

bioschemas.name: PredictPA
